Two careless admins reused a prime to generate public keys; can you recover the flag from 21039195943991032080455653715904344916561391348809897776920669458090767979017847521335768086578952048669452049664996421219992275612547570662702752640793729720112908160889941322459696481075598953960663013149002376271261856555343321 using their shared weakness?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=851216685035370254705205386016770295353847394670611843460052501059400116894976227930421088732978663376060131589735102716782002912333066031735786563877156951308474414803259170742279333464772798357463049233181480900423111941937255583, n2=963018655281049032378189181272012851057544836922072851305177804448482505314386996567834579024862273582015254820698648646175439603869286889686766208940872579491585595368822196272016245060336618932697965900261480687296288760640857397, e=203252105350671182435580293804583119461976945442934019405542477359577285796960625021459666223076246707373885900898315858356338834489329419066641108627041430695812939231013770983028309862092091074558078628832620937579233008670222293

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{ksmu4ict}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 21039195943991032080455653715904344916561391348809897776920669458090767979017847521335768086578952048669452049664996421219992275612547570662702752640793729720112908160889941322459696481075598953960663013149002376271261856555343321
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=851216685035370254705205386016770295353847394670611843460052501059400116894976227930421088732978663376060131589735102716782002912333066031735786563877156951308474414803259170742279333464772798357463049233181480900423111941937255583, n2=963018655281049032378189181272012851057544836922072851305177804448482505314386996567834579024862273582015254820698648646175439603869286889686766208940872579491585595368822196272016245060336618932697965900261480687296288760640857397, e=203252105350671182435580293804583119461976945442934019405542477359577285796960625021459666223076246707373885900898315858356338834489329419066641108627041430695812939231013770983028309862092091074558078628832620937579233008670222293
extra_info: p=30228703893850672446177311973425561759719398628528758110976683238382213260529265317793308609088238210880424844256621, q=28159218735426182608149523738528507618868738028448690901334630885409917316327620544871278239997026232732533321627323, q2=31857755418913372782041681773112971180368626887994806794233307792354336058694189132625550513941689440412236507630057, φ(n)=851216685035370254705205386016770295353847394670611843460052501059400116894976227930421088732978663376060131589735044328859373635478011704900074609807778363171817437354246859428155541334195941471600384646332395635979498983771371640, φ(n2)=963018655281049032378189181272012851057544836922072851305177804448482505314386996567834579024862273582015254820698586559716126839824058670693019670407932491466069071803916986280985508511017395478247547041138450759644996099288970720
subtype: shared_prime
archetype: rsa
